jobs.title: System Engineer
jobs.text:
•    Bachelor's degree in Industrial, Aircraft, Space or Mechatronics Engineering from leading universities in Turkey or the world
•    Preferably with a Master's/PhD degree in industrial engineering or an MBA
•    Analytical aspect strong, with theoretical and practical knowledge and standards in the field
•    System analysis and design, planning & Experienced in project management, operational feasibility, enterprise resource planning systems
•    With 3 to 6 years of full-time work experience in similar roles in defense, aerospace and systems/sub-system manufacturing companies
•    Very good command of English (good technical literacy and speaking proficiency)
•    Interested in aviation and defense industry, open to development
•    Communication aspectö strong, planned and able to work as a team
•    For male candidates who are not related to military service
•    Able to adapt to busy and flexible working hours
•    We are looking for teammates who have no travel restrictions
 
* The motivation of our candidates to apply to Codenator in their cover letters, undergraduate / graduate. They are expected to summarize their undergraduate thesis (problem, recommended approach and result) and work experience. 
* Only eligible candidates will be contacted.

jobs.title: Yeni Mezun Java Developer
jobs.text:
İnfonal, yazılım yaşam döngüsünde uzmanlık gerektiren roller için teknoloji hizmetleri sağlayan IT danışmanlık şirketidir. Sektörel olarak bankacılık, e-ticaret ve ödeme sistemleri alanında en üst seviyede IT danışmanlık hizmeti sağlamaktadır.
 
Sektör tecrübesi ile Infonal; müşteriye özel ihtiyaçları karşılamak için sunmuş olduğu çözümler ile rekabetçi bir avantaj sağlamaktadır. Yaklaşımımız; sektör standartlarına ve metodolojilerine uygun, müşteriye özel, benzersiz yazılımlar tasarlayıp, geliştirmektir.
 
Şirketimiz bünyesinde görevlendirilmek üzere;

  • Üniversitelerin Bilgisayar, Yazılım, Elektronik, Endüstri, Matematik Mühendisliği bölümlerinde okuyan, yazılım geliştirme konusunda kendini yetiştirmiş, son sınıf öğrencisi, 
  • Anadolu Yakasında ikamet eden veya çalışma olanağı bulunan,
  • Tercihen Okul döneminde part-time olarak çalışabilecek veya mezun olunca işe başlama hedefi olan, 
  • Tercihen OOP, Design Patterns, TDD, Unit Testing, kod ve yazılım standartları konularında genel bilgi sahibi veya kısa zamanda yazılım geliştirme konusunda kendisini geliştirebilecek,
  • Java, J2ee, Oracle, Spring, Hibernate ve benzeri teknolojilerde bilgi sahibi veya bu teknolojileri öğrenmeye açık,
  • SQL veritabanı konusunda bilgi sahibi,
  • İyi derecede İngilizce teknik doküman okuma bilgisine sahip,
  • Literatürü takip eden, araştırma yönü kuvvetli ve problem çözme becerisi olan,
  • Kendini geliştirme konusunda hevesli ve istekli.

İŞ TANIMI

Geliştirdiğimiz projelerde görevlendirmek üzere Yeni Mezun Java Developer aramaktayız.

jobs.title: Accounting Specialist
jobs.text:
REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS AND JOB DEFINITION
• Graduated from the Faculties of Economics and Administrative Sciences, at least at the Associate Degree level,
• At least 2 years of experience in the field,
• Developed sense of responsibility,
• Knowing e-Invoice operations and issuing Invoice-Waybill,
• Making purchase, sales invoices and bank records,
• be able to carry out Ba-Bs and general C/H reconciliations on a regular basis,
• be able to follow up and file documents regularly,
• Having knowledge about the Uniform Chart of Accounts Communiqué and its Applications,
• Proficient in MS Office programs,
• Preferably have knowledge of ETA accounting software,
• We are looking for colleagues who are not related to military service for male candidates.

jobs.title: Technical Documentation Specialist
jobs.text:
GENERAL FEATURES

•  &Bachelor's degree from Mechanical Painting, Construction or Basic Sciences (Physics, Mathematics) and similar departments of universities,
•  At least 2 years of experience in similar positions,
•  Able to use at least one of the computer aided design (CAD) programs well, 
•  Able to use MS Office programs at an advanced level,
•  Analytical thinking, problem solving ability, attention to detail,
•  Open to development, interested in the aviation and defense industry,
•  Completed military service for male candidates,
•  Candidates with a good level of English language are sought.
 

* For this position, at least 2 years of similar work experience and a good level of English are required.
* Only eligible candidates will be contacted.
 
JOB DESCRIPTION

•  Creating and updating parts catalogues, technical data documents and similar documents by using the data and technical drawings in the operational systems and design systems,
•  Prevention and elimination of technical data conflicts of prepared documents,
•  Developing and managing the technical document preparation and publishing process.

jobs.title: Artifical Intelligence Researcher
jobs.text:
BAYKAR Artificial Intelligence Teams study on areas that are separated to three major classes as high level autonomy, situational awareness, enhanced safety. We aim to develop new technologies and smart systems on aerospace and defense industries with subjects like;

•    Machine Learning and Rule Based Smart Systems

•    Computer Vision and Image Processing

•    Signal and Data Processing

•    Deep Learning

•    Reinforcement Learning

•    Path Planning

•    Probabilistic Approaches

Our AI teams have quite hardworking, forward thinking and experienced members. Team members have a great opportunity to establish a network with like-minded peers who have years of experience, expertise and knowledge in related areas. Our team members work in a conducive and harmonious environment where they get the chance to be part of the product development cycle while leading innovative researches.

Key Requirements;

•    BS, M.S. or PhD in Computer Engineering, Electric and Electronics Engineering, Mechatronics or Aerospace Engineering or other related departments

•    3+ years of experience on autonomous vehicles

•    Deeply knowledge and experience on Artificial Intelligence

•    Hands on experience on C++ and Python

•    Having knowledge of ML frameworks like PyTorch and Tensorflow

•    Experience on aerospace and defence industry

•    Ability to work with a dynamic, research focused team and excellent communication skills

•    Experience on mentorship to young interns and engineers is a plus

•    Having knowledge of Numpy, pandas and scikit

 

Description;

•    Researching and designing trend technics and studies about UAV’s

•    Working with other research and product development teams

•    Implementing systems developed to our products

 

We are looking for “Artificial Intelligence Researcher” who will be a part of our development processes. Do you want to join our team and play a role for the advancement in field of AI?
